member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1
member.summary: Thread safe circular data queue. String type is not supported.
member.typeparam: Type of data in queue. String type not supported.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new instance of CircularQueue
member.param: The maximum count of data can be stored in queue. An overflow exception will be raised when the count of queue data exceeed this value

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.PropertyReadTimeout
member.summary: Property read timeout. Default value is -1(Infinity).

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Count
member.summary: The data count in queue

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Capacity
member.summary: The capacity of queue. An OverflowException will be raised when count greater than capacity.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.AvailableCapacity
member.summary: The avaiable capacity of queue.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.AutoLock
member.summary: Whether auto lock is enabled. When set to false, the lock should be maintained by user with methods: GetLock/TryGetLock/ReleaseLock.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.BlockWait
member.summary: 在数据不足或者容量不够的情况下是否阻塞操作线程执行等待。非线程安全

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Enqueue(`0,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a single data to queue. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Data to enqueue
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Enqueue(`0[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data from array to queue. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Datas to enqueue
The number of data to enqueue. Default value is 0(Enqueue all array data element).
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Enqueue(`0[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data from 2-dimentional array to queue. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Datas to enqueue
The number of data to enqueue. Default value is 0(Enqueue all array data element).
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Enqueue(System.Array,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data(Any type except string) from array to queue. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: The number of data to enqueue. Default value is 0(Enqueue all array data element).
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Enqueue(System.Collections.Generic.IList{`0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data from IList collection to queue. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Datas to enqueue
The number of data to enqueue. Default value is 0(Enqueue all array data element).
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryEnqueue(`0,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data from 2-dimentional array to queue. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Data to enqueue
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryEnqueue(`0[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data from array to queue. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: The number of data to enqueue. Default value is 0(Enqueue all array data element).
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryEnqueue(`0[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data from 2-dimentional array to queue. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: The number of data to enqueue. Default value is 0(Enqueue all array data element).
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryEnqueue(System.Array,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data(Any type except string) from array to queue. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: The number of data to enqueue. Default value is 0(Enqueue all array data element).
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryEnqueue(System.Collections.Generic.IList{`0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enqueue a group of data from IList collection to queue. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: The number of data to enqueue. Default value is 0(Enqueue all array data element).
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Dequeue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Dequeue single data. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: The value of dequeued data.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Dequeue(`0[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Dequeue specified count of datas to array. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Buffer that store dequeued data. Cannot be null.
The number of data to dequeue. Default value is 0(dequeueCount set to the length of dequeueBuffer.
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: 返回实际取到的数据长度

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Dequeue(`0[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Dequeue specified count of datas to array. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Buffer that store dequeued data. Cannot be null.
The number of data to dequeue. Default value is 0(dequeueCount set to the length of dequeueBuffer.
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: 返回实际取到的数据长度

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Dequeue(System.Collections.Generic.IList{`0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Dequeue specified count of data to IList collection. A TimtoutException will be raised when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Buffer that store dequeued data. Cannot be null.
The number of data to dequeue. This value should be greater than 0.
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryDequeue(`0@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Dequeue single data. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Buffer that store dequeued data.
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryDequeue(`0[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Dequeue specified count of datas to array. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Buffer that store dequeued data. Cannot be null.
The number of data to dequeue. Default value is 0(dequeueCount set to the length of dequeueBuffer.
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryDequeue(`0[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Dequeue specified count of datas to 2-dimentional array. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Buffer that store dequeued data. Cannot be null.
The number of data to dequeue. Default value is 0(dequeueCount set to the length of dequeueBuffer.
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryDequeue(System.Collections.Generic.IList{`0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Dequeue specified count of data to IList Collection. This method will return false when mutex acquization failed.
member.param: Buffer that store dequeued data. Cannot be null.
The number of data to dequeue. This value should be greater than 0.
Operation timeout in milliseconds. default value is -1(Infinity).
member.returns: True: Operation success. False: Mutex acquization failed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Enter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get queue operation lock. Available when 'AutoLock' is false. TimeoutException will be raised when lock not acquired in specified timeout.
member.param: Lock operation timeout in milliseconds. 0: no wait; -1: always wait until lock acquired.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.TryEnter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Try get queue operation lock. Available when 'AutoLock' is false. Returns true when lock acquired during specified timeout, otherwise return false.
member.param: Lock operation timeout in milliseconds. 0: no wait; -1: always wait until lock acquired.
member.returns: True: Lock acuqired during timeout; False: Otherwise

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Leave
member.summary: Release queue Lock. Available when 'AutoLock' is false. Recommanded to be called in finally block.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.CircularQueue`1.Clear
member.summary: 清空缓冲区内的数据

summary.para: Thread Safe Queue is similar to Queue except Dequeue blocks when no elements are in queue until one is present or queue is destroyed..
Chinese Simplified: 安全线程队列是原始Queue的一种补充，当没有数据在队列中时，会在出队列中进行阻挡性操作，直到数据出现或者队列销毁。
Gets flag indicating if queue has been destroyed.
Chinese Simplified: 判断当前队列是否已经被销毁。
Create a new TSQ.
Chinese Simplified:创建一个安全线程队列 。

param.name: col
param.para: The System.Collections.ICollection from which to copy elements.
param.param: Chinese Simplified: 从该system.collections.icollection复制元素。

summary.para: Create a new TSQ.
Chinese Simplified:创建一个安全线程队列 。

param.name: capacity
param.para: The initial maximum number of elements.
param.param: Chinese Simplified: 初始化最大的元素数值。

param.name: growFactor
param.para: The expansion factor for the capacity of the queue.
param.param: Chinese Simplified: 队列容量的扩展因子 。

summary.para: Create a new TSQ.
Chinese Simplified:创建一个安全线程队列 。

param.name: capacity
param.para: The initial maximum number of elements.
param.param: Chinese Simplified: 初始化最大的元素数值。

summary.para: Create a new TSQ.
Chinese Simplified:创建一个安全线程队列 。
Destroy queue, resume any waiting thread.
Chinese Simplified:销毁队列，析构函数 。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.ThreadSafeQueue.Clear
member.summary: Remove all elements from Queue.

summary.para: Remove all elements from Queue.
Chinese Simplified:清空队列元素。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.ThreadSafeQueue.Dequeue

summary.para: Removes and returns the element at the beginning of the Queue.
Chinese Simplified:获取队列中最前端的数据。

member.returns: first element in queue.
member.exception: Thrown if the Queue is destroyed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.ThreadSafeQueue.Dequeue(System.TimeSpan)

summary.para: Removes and returns the element at the beginning of the Queue.
Chinese Simplified:获取队列中最前端的数据。

param.name: timeout
param.para: time to wait before returning if no element exists.
param.param: Chinese Simplified: 如果没有元素存在等待的时间。

member.returns: element in queue.
member.exception: Thrown if no element exists in queue longer than specified Timeout or if the Queue is destroyed.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.ThreadSafeQueue.ThreadSafeQueue.Dequeue(System.Int32)

summary.para: Removes and returns the element at the beginning of the Queue.
Chinese Simplified:获取队列中最前端的数据。

param.name: timeout
param.para: time to wait before returning (in milliseconds) if no element exists.
param.param: Chinese Simplified: 如果没有元素存在等待的时间(ms)。

member.returns: first element in queue.
member.exception: Thrown if no element exists in queue longer than specified Timeout or if the Queue is destroyed.

summary.para: Adds an element to the end of Queue.
Chinese Simplified:添加元素到队列中。
Remove all elements from Queue, resume any blocked dequeue threads.
Chinese Simplified:销毁队列，同时恢复所有被阻挡的队列以及线程。
